topics.body:
Want to know something really weird?

My grandfather is 67 years old and retired. And he DOESN'T know who Ronnie James Dio is.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5414939d636872331fa50100#post_5414939d636872331fa50100
This is an unacceptable state of affairs. Every human should know who Ronny James Dio is.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7

topics.body:
"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/541493f36368721019a50000#post_541493f36368721019a50000
I was having lunch with him one day and we started talking about old-school metal and I dropped his name, and he looked at me with a straight face and said "who is that." I choked on my tea a bit.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/541494706368727d881d0000#post_541494706368727d881d0000

"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/541493f36368721019a50000#post_541493f36368721019a50000

Is it possible he was fucking with you? I mean in terms of old school metal he should at least know him as the original (superior) lead singer of Black Sabbath.

topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5414954763687214721a0000#post_5414954763687214721a0000
Ronnie James Dio is one of the godfathers of heavy metal. He was fucking amazing, and died a few years back. His bands were Rainbow (seriously, dude made Rainbows metal), Black Sabbath, Dio and Heaven and Hell.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7
